content: this legal text summarizes the progress of a court case without providing specific details about the parties involved the court made a decision on may 5 2023 in a civil case that took place in iru county court the court partially satisfied the claim and ordered the division of joint assets in a divorce case between two parties referred to as k pa and r pa r pa is required to compensate k pa for certain obligations a loan agreement balance and a debt arising from a loan agreement totaling 5822 euros and 97 cents the costs of the proceedings will be borne by both parties the decision can be appealed within 30 days to the tartu district court the court also annulled the judgment and sent the case for a new review and the judge has signed the document digitally
